017package org.apache.juneau.bean.atom;
018
019import static org.apache.juneau.xml.annotation.XmlFormat.*;
020
021import java.util.*;
022
023import org.apache.juneau.annotation.*;
024import org.apache.juneau.xml.annotation.*;
025
026/**
027 * Represents a top-level Atom feed document.
028 *
029 * <p>
030 * An Atom feed is a Web resource that contains metadata and optionally a set of entries.
031 * Feeds are the top-level container element in Atom documents and act as a manifest of metadata
032 * and data associated with a collection of related resources.
033 *
034 * <p>
035 * The feed is the fundamental unit of syndication in Atom and is used to aggregate entries that
036 * share a common purpose, such as a blog, podcast channel, or news source.
037 *
038 * <h5 class='figure'>Schema</h5>
039 * <p class='bschema'>
040 *    atomFeed =
041 *       element atom:feed {
042 *          atomCommonAttributes,
043 *          (atomAuthor*
044 *           &amp; atomCategory*
045 *           &amp; atomContributor*
046 *           &amp; atomGenerator?
047 *           &amp; atomIcon?
048 *           &amp; atomId
049 *           &amp; atomLink*
050 *           &amp; atomLogo?
051 *           &amp; atomRights?
052 *           &amp; atomSubtitle?
053 *           &amp; atomTitle
054 *           &amp; atomUpdated
055 *           &amp; extensionElement*),
056 *          atomEntry*
057 *       }
058 * </p>
059 *
060 * <h5 class='section'>Required Elements:</h5>
061 * <p>
062 * Per RFC 4287, the following elements are required in a feed:
063 * <ul class='spaced-list'>
064 *    <li><c>atom:id</c> - A permanent, universally unique identifier for the feed.
065 *    <li><c>atom:title</c> - A human-readable title for the feed.
066 *    <li><c>atom:updated</c> - The most recent instant in time when the feed was modified.
067 * </ul>
068 *
069 * <h5 class='section'>Recommended Elements:</h5>
070 * <p>
071 * The following elements are recommended but not required:
072 * <ul class='spaced-list'>
073 *    <li><c>atom:author</c> - Authors of the feed (required if entries don't have authors).
074 *    <li><c>atom:link</c> - Links associated with the feed (should include a "self" link).
075 * </ul>
076 *
077 * <h5 class='section'>Example:</h5>
078 * <p class='bjava'>
079 *    <jc>// Create a feed using fluent-style setters</jc>
080 *    Feed <jv>feed</jv> = <jk>new</jk> Feed(
081 *       <js>"tag:example.org,2024:feed"</js>,
082 *       <js>"Example Feed"</js>,
083 *       <js>"2024-01-15T12:00:00Z"</js>
084 *    )
085 *    .setSubtitle(<js>"A sample Atom feed"</js>)
086 *    .setLinks(
087 *       <jk>new</jk> Link(<js>"self"</js>, <js>"application/atom+xml"</js>, <js>"http://example.org/feed.atom"</js>),
088 *       <jk>new</jk> Link(<js>"alternate"</js>, <js>"text/html"</js>, <js>"http://example.org"</js>)
089 *    )
090 *    .setAuthors(
091 *       <jk>new</jk> Person(<js>"John Doe"</js>).setEmail(<js>"john@example.org"</js>)
092 *    )
093 *    .setEntries(
094 *       <jk>new</jk> Entry(<js>"tag:example.org,2024:entry1"</js>, <js>"First Post"</js>, <js>"2024-01-15T12:00:00Z"</js>)
095 *          .setSummary(<js>"This is the first post"</js>)
096 *    );
097 *
098 *    <jc>// Serialize to ATOM/XML</jc>
099 *    String <jv>atomXml</jv> = XmlSerializer.<jsf>DEFAULT_SQ_READABLE</jsf>.serialize(<jv>feed</jv>);
100 * </p>
101 *
102 * <h5 class='section'>Specification:</h5>
103 * <p>
104 * Represents an <c>atomFeed</c> construct in the
105 * <a class="doclink" href="https://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc4287#section-4.1.1">RFC 4287 - Section 4.1.1</a> specification.
106 *
107 * <h5 class='section'>See Also:</h5><ul>
108 *    <li class='link'><a class="doclink" href="https://juneau.apache.org/docs/topics/JuneauBeanAtom">juneau-bean-atom</a>
109 *    <li class='extlink'><a class="doclink" href="https://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc4287">RFC 4287 - The Atom Syndication Format</a>
110 * </ul>
111 */
112@Bean(typeName="feed")
113public class Feed extends CommonEntry {
114
115   private Generator generator;  // atomGenerator?
116   private Icon icon;            // atomIcon?
117   private Logo logo;            // atomLogo?
118   private Text subtitle;        // atomSubtitle?
119   private Entry[] entries;      // atomEntry*
120
121   /**
122    * Normal constructor.
123    *
124    * @param id The feed identifier.
125    * @param title The feed title.
126    * @param updated The feed updated timestamp.
127    */
128   public Feed(Id id, Text title, Calendar updated) {
129      super(id, title, updated);
130   }
131
132   /**
133    * Normal constructor.
134    *
135    * @param id The feed identifier.
136    * @param title The feed title.
137    * @param updated The feed updated timestamp.
138    */
139   public Feed(String id, String title, String updated) {
140      super(id, title, updated);
141   }
142
143   /** Bean constructor. */
144   public Feed() {}
145
146   //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
147   // Bean properties
148   //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
149
150   /**
151    * Bean property getter:  <property>generator</property>.
152    *
153    * <p>
154    * Identifies the software agent used to generate the feed.
155    *
156    * <p>
157    * This is useful for debugging and analytics purposes, allowing consumers to identify the
158    * software responsible for producing the feed.
159    *
160    * @return The property value, or <jk>null</jk> if it is not set.
161    */
162   public Generator getGenerator() {
163      return generator;
164   }
165
166   /**
167    * Bean property setter:  <property>generator</property>.
168    *
169    * <p>
170    * Identifies the software agent used to generate the feed.
171    *
172    * <h5 class='section'>Example:</h5>
173    * <p class='bjava'>
174    *    Feed <jv>feed</jv> = <jk>new</jk> Feed(...)
175    *       .setGenerator(
176    *          <jk>new</jk> Generator(<js>"My Blog Software"</js>)
177    *             .setUri(<js>"http://www.example.com/software"</js>)
178    *             .setVersion(<js>"2.0"</js>)
179    *       );
180    * </p>
181    *
182    * @param value
183    *    The new value for this property.
184    *    <br>Can be <jk>null</jk> to unset the property.
185    * @return This object.
186    */
187   public Feed setGenerator(Generator value) {
188      this.generator = value;
189      return this;
190   }
191
192   /**
193    * Bean property getter:  <property>icon</property>.
194    *
195    * <p>
196    * Identifies a small image that provides iconic visual identification for the feed.
197    *
198    * <p>
199    * Icons should be square and small (typically 16x16 or similar). The image should have an
200    * aspect ratio of 1 (horizontal) to 1 (vertical).
201    *
202    * @return The property value, or <jk>null</jk> if it is not set.
203    */
204   public Icon getIcon() {
205      return icon;
206   }
207
208   /**
209    * Bean property setter:  <property>icon</property>.
210    *
211    * <p>
212    * Identifies a small image that provides iconic visual identification for the feed.
213    *
214    * <h5 class='section'>Example:</h5>
215    * <p class='bjava'>
216    *    Feed <jv>feed</jv> = <jk>new</jk> Feed(...)
217    *       .setIcon(<jk>new</jk> Icon(<js>"http://example.org/icon.png"</js>));
218    * </p>
219    *
220    * @param value
221    *    The new value for this property.
222    *    <br>Can be <jk>null</jk> to unset the property.
223    * @return This object.
224    */
225   public Feed setIcon(Icon value) {
226      this.icon = value;
227      return this;
228   }
229
230   /**
231    * Bean property getter:  <property>logo</property>.
232    *
233    * <p>
234    * Identifies a larger image that provides visual identification for the feed.
235    *
236    * <p>
237    * Logos should be twice as wide as they are tall (aspect ratio of 2:1).
238    *
239    * @return The property value, or <jk>null</jk> if it is not set.
240    */
241   public Logo getLogo() {
242      return logo;
243   }
244
245   /**
246    * Bean property setter:  <property>logo</property>.
247    *
248    * <p>
249    * Identifies a larger image that provides visual identification for the feed.
250    *
251    * <h5 class='section'>Example:</h5>
252    * <p class='bjava'>
253    *    Feed <jv>feed</jv> = <jk>new</jk> Feed(...)
254    *       .setLogo(<jk>new</jk> Logo(<js>"http://example.org/logo.png"</js>));
255    * </p>
256    *
257    * @param value
258    *    The new value for this property.
259    *    <br>Can be <jk>null</jk> to unset the property.
260    * @return This object.
261    */
262   public Feed setLogo(Logo value) {
263      this.logo = value;
264      return this;
265   }
266
267   /**
268    * Bean property getter:  <property>subtitle</property>.
269    *
270    * <p>
271    * Returns a human-readable description or subtitle for the feed.
272    *
273    * <p>
274    * The subtitle provides additional context about the feed's purpose or content beyond
275    * what is conveyed in the title.
276    *
277    * @return The property value, or <jk>null</jk> if it is not set.
278    */
279   public Text getSubtitle() {
280      return subtitle;
281   }
282
283   /**
284    * Bean property setter:  <property>subtitle</property>.
285    *
286    * <p>
287    * Sets a human-readable description or subtitle for the feed.
288    *
289    * <h5 class='section'>Example:</h5>
290    * <p class='bjava'>
291    *    Feed <jv>feed</jv> = <jk>new</jk> Feed(...)
292    *       .setSubtitle(
293    *          <jk>new</jk> Text(<js>"html"</js>)
294    *             .setText(<js>"A &lt;em&gt;comprehensive&lt;/em&gt; guide to Atom feeds"</js>)
295    *       );
296    * </p>
297    *
298    * @param value
299    *    The new value for this property.
300    *    <br>Can be <jk>null</jk> to unset the property.
301    * @return This object.
302    */
303   public Feed setSubtitle(Text value) {
304      this.subtitle = value;
305      return this;
306   }
307
308   /**
309    * Bean property fluent setter:  <property>subtitle</property>.
310    *
311    * <p>
312    * Sets a human-readable description or subtitle for the feed as plain text.
313    *
314    * @param value
315    *    The new value for this property.
316    *    <br>Can be <jk>null</jk> to unset the property.
317    * @return This object.
318    */
319   public Feed setSubtitle(String value) {
320      setSubtitle(new Text(value));
321      return this;
322   }
323
324   /**
325    * Bean property getter:  <property>entries</property>.
326    *
327    * <p>
328    * Returns the individual entries contained within this feed.
329    *
330    * <p>
331    * Each entry represents a single item in the feed, such as a blog post, news article,
332    * podcast episode, or other discrete piece of content. Entries contain their own metadata
333    * including title, content, links, and timestamps.
334    *
335    * @return The property value, or <jk>null</jk> if it is not set.
336    */
337   @Xml(format=COLLAPSED)
338   public Entry[] getEntries() {
339      return entries;
340   }
341
342   /**
343    * Bean property setter:  <property>entries</property>.
344    *
345    * <p>
346    * Sets the individual entries contained within this feed.
347    *
348    * <h5 class='section'>Example:</h5>
349    * <p class='bjava'>
350    *    Feed <jv>feed</jv> = <jk>new</jk> Feed(...)
351    *       .setEntries(
352    *          <jk>new</jk> Entry(
353    *             <js>"tag:example.org,2024:entry1"</js>,
354    *             <js>"First Post"</js>,
355    *             <js>"2024-01-15T12:00:00Z"</js>
356    *          )
357    *          .setContent(
358    *             <jk>new</jk> Content(<js>"html"</js>)
359    *                .setText(<js>"&lt;p&gt;This is the content&lt;/p&gt;"</js>)
360    *          ),
361    *          <jk>new</jk> Entry(
362    *             <js>"tag:example.org,2024:entry2"</js>,
363    *             <js>"Second Post"</js>,
364    *             <js>"2024-01-16T12:00:00Z"</js>
365    *          )
366    *       );
367    * </p>
368    *
369    * @param value
370    *    The new value for this property.
371    *    <br>Can be <jk>null</jk> to unset the property.
372    * @return This object.
373    */
374   public Feed setEntries(Entry...value) {
375      this.entries = value;
376      return this;
377   }
378
379   //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
380   // Overridden setters (to simplify method chaining)
381   //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
382
383   @Override /* Overridden from Common */
384   public Feed setBase(Object value) {
385      super.setBase(value);
386      return this;
387   }
388
389   @Override /* Overridden from Common */
390   public Feed setLang(String value) {
391      super.setLang(value);
392      return this;
393   }
394
395   @Override /* Overridden from CommonEntry */
396   public Feed setAuthors(Person...value) {
397      super.setAuthors(value);
398      return this;
399   }
400
401   @Override /* Overridden from CommonEntry */
402   public Feed setCategories(Category...value) {
403      super.setCategories(value);
404      return this;
405   }
406
407   @Override /* Overridden from CommonEntry */
408   public Feed setContributors(Person...value) {
409      super.setContributors(value);
410      return this;
411   }
412
413   @Override /* Overridden from CommonEntry */
414   public Feed setId(String value) {
415      super.setId(value);
416      return this;
417   }
418
419   @Override /* Overridden from CommonEntry */
420   public Feed setId(Id value) {
421      super.setId(value);
422      return this;
423   }
424
425   @Override /* Overridden from CommonEntry */
426   public Feed setLinks(Link...value) {
427      super.setLinks(value);
428      return this;
429   }
430
431   @Override /* Overridden from CommonEntry */
432   public Feed setRights(String value) {
433      super.setRights(value);
434      return this;
435   }
436
437   @Override /* Overridden from CommonEntry */
438   public Feed setRights(Text value) {
439      super.setRights(value);
440      return this;
441   }
442
443   @Override /* Overridden from CommonEntry */
444   public Feed setTitle(String value) {
445      super.setTitle(value);
446      return this;
447   }
448
449   @Override /* Overridden from CommonEntry */
450   public Feed setTitle(Text value) {
451      super.setTitle(value);
452      return this;
453   }
454
455   @Override /* Overridden from CommonEntry */
456   public Feed setUpdated(String value) {
457      super.setUpdated(value);
458      return this;
459   }
460
461   @Override /* Overridden from CommonEntry */
462   public Feed setUpdated(Calendar value) {
463      super.setUpdated(value);
464      return this;
465   }
466}
